A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly can't see why there is so much hate on this one. The Last Jedi is easily the best Star Wars movie ever not including the New Hope. Maybe my expectations were low because of the Force Awakens but I don't know. The Praetorian guard scene on the Supremacy is easily one of the most intense scenes ever. The climax was also greatly executed. Also who couldn't love PORGS!!!!????\n-8.5/10
